alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 2:51PM EST until December 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...PROLONGED WINTER STORM EXPECTED LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY... .Low pressure across the Mid Atlantic will move north and east into southern New England tonight and on Friday...with the season`s first widespread winter storm expected to continue across the area through Saturday. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snowfall of 8 to 12 inches expected with higher snowfall totals expected for elevations above 1500 feet. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...A snowstorm will bring plowable snow to the region with a period of moderate travel impacts expected. Periods of moderate snow and low visibility will be the biggest hazards.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
